data.name: Configure RabbitMQ
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="timer://configure-{{source}}?repeatCount=1"/>
    <setHeader name="MQ_NAME">
        <constant>
            {{MQ_NAME}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="MQ_PROTOCOL">
        <constant>
            {{MQ_PROTOCOL}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="MQ_HOST">
        <constant>
            {{MQ_HOST}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="MQ_PORT">
        <constant>
            {{MQ_PORT}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{#if MQ_USER}}
    <setHeader name="MQ_USER">
        <constant>
            {{MQ_USER}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{/if}}
     {{#if MQ_PASS}}
    <setHeader name="MQ_PASS">
        <constant>
            {{safe MQ_PASS}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{/if}}
    <setHeader name="DECLARED_QUEUES">
        <constant>
            {{declared_queues}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <process ref="rabbitMQConfigSetter"/>
</route>
